Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class TurnController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.TurnController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class TurnController extends Object implements Serializable
This Class contains all the methods used to manage every single turn of the match. It controls the flow of the match. It is also able to save and restore the game.
See Also:
